entry.string: Add SSO User to Xaraya Database on Login
entry.translation: Edd SSO User tu Xereya Detebese-a oon Lugeen

entry.string: If a user has been authenticated by the web server but does not have a login account to Xaraya, the user will not be able to login. By selecting this option, a user that has been authenticated by the web server will be automatically added to the Xaraya database and allowed to login.
entry.translation: Iff a user hes beee oozeenteeceted by zee veb serfer boot dues nut hefe-a a lugeen eccuoont tu Xereya, zee user veell nut be-a eble-a tu lugeen. By selecteeng thees oopshun, a user thet hes beee oozeenteeceted by zee veb serfer veell be-a ootumeteecelly edded tu zee Xereya detebese-a und ellooed tu lugeen.

entry.string: Use LDAP to Retrieve User Information
entry.translation: Use-a LDEP tu Retreeefe-a User Inffurmeshun

entry.string: User information can be retrieved from an LDAP server via the xarLDAP module. Be sure that xarLDAP is configured appropriately.
entry.translation: User inffurmeshun cun be-a retreeefed frum un LDEP serfer feea zee xerLDEP mudoole-a. Be-a soore-a thet xerLDEP is cunffeegoored epprupreeetely. Bork bork bork!
